insights.populationGrowth: Stable at 0.8% annually. Cultural and spiritual significance attracts some tourism employment while maintaining traditional lifestyle.
insights.educationLevel: Good education with 85% literacy. Traditional Buddhist education combined with modern schooling.
insights.employmentPattern: Agriculture 45%, tourism 20%, traditional crafts 15%, government 12%, services 8%. Cultural tourism growing sector.
insights.housingPattern: Traditional Bhutanese houses 70%, modern houses 25%, guesthouses/hotels 5%.

insights.temperature: Temperate climate with cold winters (5째C) and mild summers (20째C). High altitude (2,600m-4,500m) creates cool conditions year-round.
insights.precipitation: Annual precipitation 1,200mm with monsoon concentration (June-September). Good water resources from high elevation catchments.
insights.seasonality: Cool dry winter (December-February), pre-monsoon spring (March-May), wet monsoon summer (June-September), clear autumn (October-November).
insights.extremeEvents: Occasional late snowfall affecting crops, monsoon flooding in valleys, landslides on steep slopes, drought during failed monsoons.

vulnerabilities.infrastructure: Limited road access, vulnerable to weather-related disruptions
vulnerabilities.social: Traditional agricultural lifestyle vulnerable to climate change, aging population in rural areas
vulnerabilities.economic: Tourism and agriculture dependent on favorable weather conditions
